channel.title: Posts on Blogs

item.title: Hugo - tutorial
item.description: Hugo is a static site generator written in Go. Install sudo apt-get install hugo hugo version Create a new site # this will create a new hugo site in a folder named blogs hugo new site blogs Add a theme cd blogs # Download the theme git init git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke # Edit your config.toml configuration file # and add the Ananke theme. echo 'theme = "ananke"' >> config.
